details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Irena to become a Wind Archer

build: -> -> ->

-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Trifling Wind - Reinforce, Enhance and Double Chance
  • Song of Heaven - Reinforce and Boss Rush

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
*
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • The last skill from the Secondary Trio can be any skill as Wind Archer only has 5 skills to boost
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • A 3 Boost Node combination is also possible using 2 nodes containing and 1 node containing (left at Master Level 30)

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 130%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Max Hits: 1

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Noble Mind
primary.shortDesc: Increases Empress's Blessing max level by 6
details: This skill is leveled up by completing quests from Neinheart after Lv. 125

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
details: Can be activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: + 4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Breeze Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fires a shot of arrows forward

primary.name: Wind Walk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Moves along the platform on the ground and stops at the end of the platform. Can be used with Gust Swift in the air.\nPassive Effect: Speed: +35, Jump: +15, Max Speed: +20
primary.desc: Dash through enemies without taking any touch damage
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed
Can be used in the air

primary.name: Gust Swift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
details: Modifies the appearance of

primary.name: Storm Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%

primary.name: Whispers of the Wind
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Range: +160

primary.name: Gust Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Fires an arrow, if there are multiple enemies, you will fire multiple arrows
details: Each arrow hits only one enemy

primary.name: Spiraling Vortex
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Max Enemies Pushed Back: 6, Damage: 175%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Trifling Wind I
primary.shortDesc: Max soul energy created: 3, Chance to create energy: 30%, Random enemies damaged: 170%, Chance to create enhanced soul energy: 5%, Damage of enhanced soul energy: 210%
primary.desc: While toggled, successful attacks have a chance to create homing arrows
details: There is a small chance to create an enhanced homing arrow that deals increased damage
Homing arrows prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Sylvan Aid
primary.shortDesc: Allows you to use your skills without consuming arrows. ATT: +20, Critical Rate: +10%
details: Uses the arrow with the highest Attack to calculate your damage

primary.name: Agile Bows
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20

primary.name: Bow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +50%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Sentient Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Release a burst of gust around your character damaging enemies caught within

primary.name: Pinpoint Pierce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 340%, Number of Attacks: 2.\nActivates a debuff of 15% Damage and 15% Ignore Defense to all of Wind Archer's attacks for 60 sec.
primary.desc: Fires two arrows towards one enemy and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy receives increased %Damage and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Trifling Wind II
primary.shortDesc: Max soul energy created: 4, Chance to create energy: 40%, Random enemies damaged: 215%, Chance to create enhanced soul energy: 10%, Damage of enhanced soul energy: 270%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage

primary.name: Eagle Eye
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Max HP: +1500, Critical Rate: +10%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Emerald Flower
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Duration: 60 sec. Crystal Flower HP: 20000 Slows affected enemies.
primary.desc: Creates a green crystal that attracts nearby enemies and takes aggression
details: Enemies nearby are also slowed

primary.name: Featherweight
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -30%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Second Wind
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability Chance: +30%, Defense: +1000\nWhen attack hits, Attack Power: +15 for 5 sec
details: Upon successful attacks, grants a flat Attack buff

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Fairy Spiral
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Max Enemies Pushed Back: 6, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Passive Effect: Sentient Arrow Damage: +100% points]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Song of Heaven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 390%
primary.desc: While held, fires a hurricane of arrows
details: You cannot move while using this skill

primary.name: Trifling Wind III
primary.shortDesc: Max soul energy created: 5, Chance to create energy: 50%, Random enemies damaged: 290%, Chance to create enhanced soul energy: 20%, Damage of enhanced soul energy: 390%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage

primary.name: Storm Bringer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Duration: 200 sec., Chance to summon a large arrow on attack: 30%, Additional Damage from Arrow: 380%
primary.desc: While active, successful attacks have a chance to create large homing arrows
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Touch of the Wind
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10%, Dexterity: +15%, Max HP: +20%, Additional Avoidability: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Bow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Final Damage: +35%, Critical Damage: +20%, Damage Against Bosses: +40%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage, %Crit Damage, and %Boss Damage

primary.name: Emerald Dust
primary.shortDesc: Increases Crystal Flower's Max HP to 40000, Monster DEF: -10%, Damage Intake: -20%
primary.desc: Increases the Max HP of summon and now grants reduces nearby enemy %DEF and increases %Damage Reduction while active

primary.name: Albatross Max
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Damage: +25%, Ignore Enemy Defense: +15%, Critical Rate: +15%, Status Resistance: +15, Elemental Resistance: +15%, Attack Speed: +1
details: Effects below are added additively to
Increases Attack and %Crit Rate provided and increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Now increases %Damage, %Ignore DEF, Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Elemental Resistance

hyperPassive.name: Trifling Wind - Double Chance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Spirit Aura occurs twice and can hit a target twice
hyperPassive.desc: Doubles amount of homing arrows created from successful attacks
details: Homing arrows won't be created beyond the max limit
If the max number of enemies that can be attacked is exceeded, homing arrows will target the same enemy

hyperActive.name: Storm Whim
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 30, Strong Spirit Arrow Chance: 30%, Damage: 560%\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to create powerful homing arrows
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Monsoon
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 430%, Number of Attacks: 12. Debuff Damage: 200% every 1 sec for 30 sec.\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a giant monsoon that damages enemies in a large area
details: Surviving enemies gain a damaging debuff

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly Cygnus Knights and Mihile in the party receive the effect\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Howling Gale
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, consumes wind energy to summon a gust for 10 sec
The power of the summoned gust varies based on the amount of wind energy
1 - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 3, Gust Summoned: 1
2 - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1560%, Number of Attacks: 3, Gust Summoned: 1
3 - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Gust Damage: 1560%, Number of Attacks: 3, Gust Summoned: 1. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Gust Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 3, Gust Summoned: 1
Wind energy increases by 1 every 20 sec and you can hold up to 3.
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant vortex that moves forward and pushes enemies back. This skill costs a special resource called 'Wind Energy'
details: Gain 1 Wind Energy every 20 secs (up to 3)
[Consume 1 Wind Energy]: Creates a smaller vortex that is quicker but deals less damage
[Consume 2 Wind Energy]: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together creates a giant vortex that is slower but deals more damage
[Consume 3 Wind Energy]: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together creates two giant vortexes, one deals more damage than the other
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Speed Reduction Mode ON/OFF causing the gale to slow down when it collides with an enemy
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Merciless Winds
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 8 sec. Creates 10 enemy-seeking Spirit Arrows that deal 1100% damage 3 times.
If more than one Spirit Arrow strikes the same enemy, the Final Damage of each additional arrow is reduced by 15%.
Enemies hit by Spirit Arrows take 1000% damage every 1 sec for 9 sec
Cooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create homing arrows that seek out nearby enemies
details: Enemies hit gain a damaging debuff
Enemies hit by multiple arrows will take reduced %Final Damage after the first
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Gale Barrier
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 45 sec, creates a wind barrier with the 300 Elemental
Damage is nullified when the 1 Elemental is used for damage equal to 1% of max HP when hit. Also applies to attacks that deal damage proportional to the max HP.
Launches 3 whirlwind(s) that deal(s) 1100% damage every 2 sec upon attack. Decreases the Final Damage of the whirlwind by 50% if multiple whirlwinds attack 1 enemy.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a wind barrier that protects you from enemy attacks. Additionally, periodically when you attack, you create whirlwinds that seek and attack nearby enemies
details:
The barrier has a special resource called 'Elemental'. 1 Elemental is consumed per each 1% Max HP taken as damage while also blocking the attack. Once the barrier reaches 0 Elemental, you will no longer block attacks but the buff will still be active
  • The amount of Elemental that Gale Barrier increases with Skill Level
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Vortex Sphere
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750. Creates a Vortex Sphere, which moves on a collision course with the enemy. The sphere periodically attacks up to 10 enemies, for 800% damage, 6 times.
Decreases Vortex Sphere's speed by 50% for 1 sec if a Boss Monster is attacked.
Collision occurs up to 20 times for each enemy.
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Fires a damaging orb that slowly travels forward while pulling in enemies
details: Attack slows down if it damages a boss
Each enemy can only be hit up to 20 times by the orb
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Wind Archer is DEX archer class part of the Cygnus Knights. Wind Archers are known for their evasive playstyle and beautiful attacks
